titles.title: Fort Monroe National Monument Land Acquisition Act
Fort Monroe National Monument Land Acquisition Act
A bill to provide for the acquisition of non-Federal land for inclusion in the Fort Monroe National Monument in the State of Virginia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Fort Monroe National Monument Land Acquisition Act
This bill directs the National Park Service, if the State of Virginia offers to convey 40 acres of identified land in Virginia, to add and administer the land as part of the Fort Monroe National Monument.
As part of such conveyance, Virginia may reserve and retain its rights under any leases in existence on the land on the day before conveyance.
